text: Two Memories is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithTwo MemoriesTWO MEMORIES and stars Marion Leonard, David Miles, and Mary Pickford. ==Actors== * Marion Leonard as Marion Francis * David Miles as Henry Lawrence * Mary Pickford as Marion's Sister * Charles Avery as Party Guest * Clara T. Bracy * John R. Cumpson as Party Guest * Robert Harron * Anita Hendrie as Party Guest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Two Memories
